name: Calangute Beach
desc: Calangute beach is one of most famous place in goa to visit. Lots  of  famous resturent and pubs are present here.

name: Resturant
desc: Goa cuisine is world famous for the its foods and drinks. explore the best resturents around.

name: Historic places
desc: Strength of Goa is in the spritual places. Goa is famous for its temples and churches.

name: Waterfall
desc: Beauty of goa is in its nature. Explore the amazing waterfall of Goan beauty

name: hidden places
desc: Goa is small states but lots of unexplored places.
